Without getting too specific, we are saddened that you didn't bring up any issue at all during your very lengthy (almost two weeks) stay. Other people who shared your room with you, and extended their stay themselves and also did not report any issues at all. As I explained to you the first time we spoke, I inspected every inch of your room with our housekeeping manager without delay and there was no trace of any insects whatsoever.   Our facility is inspected vigorously by outside pest service professionals and we have service records from January, March, and May that give that room in particular a complete clean rating with no issue at all whatsoever. It was inspected not because there was an issue, but because every inch of our facility, every room, gets vigorously inspected to maintain the high standards that we pride ourselves on, and welcome any guest, any person the ability to review these documents!  Any claim of this nature that occurs days after a guest leaves, and after such a lengthy stay are always suspect to any professional in this industry, but after multiple inspections by our staff and (verifiable) pest service professionals we are without a doubt that there was no pest issue in your room.   We wish you luck in your future.  "Neither fire nor wind, birth nor death can erase our good deeds."   -Buddha

Summary: After a house flood and a not so comfortable stay down the street my wife was greeted on the phone by Daisy who you could hear smiling through the phone and we where sold. We checked in with the help of Steve Perez who provided great customer service with answers to all our questions and has followed through with the same service day after day. Smoke free, pet friendly no foul odors, clean rooms with computers, cable TV w/HBO, free WiFi and a omelet bar for breakfast. Stop your search now. Thank you to the staff at The Prominence for making us feel at home.
Manager Response: Dear Ron E.,  It's been lovely having you and your family stay with us while your place gets back in shape. We are sorry that those circumstances made you stay with us, but we are glad we could provide service and facilities to keep you as long as we did!  We want to thank you for all the kind words for our staff on here and those delivered in person. Any time you need a room you be sure to let us know, we will take care of you.   "The greatest quality is seeking to serve others"   -Buddha

Summary Heading: I love the free breakfast they serve.
Summary: The staff at this hotel were very pleasant toward guests. They are very accommodating. The price was right and they allowed my pet. The rooms are well kept and my room in particular had a nice view of a hillside.

Summary Heading: Best place in Lake Forest bar none!
Summary: Extra clean, modern, neat, easy check in and easy check out.  Will definitely stay here again, and again! Easy to find location, great parking, great customer service. Extra large room, microwave, mini fridge, coffee & tea, and a couch!

This hotel is an excellent value.  The room was a large one bedroom suite.  The area was very nice.  Everything in the room and lobby was very clean.  The sofa in the room showed some signs of wear and could probably be replaced but other than that everything was good.  The room had a small kitchen, but I didn't use it.  There were two televisions.  The one in the living room area was a flatscreen with cable and DVD player. There were a lot of cables visible and they should consider putting a small cabinet or something in front of the cables to tidy things up.  The TV in the bedroom was the older tube type and they should consider replacing it, but it worked fine.  The air conditioning worked well.  Parking was great.  There are some good quick service restaurants close by.  The

Nice front Desk Staff and Acceptable Clean Room Service.  I actually have nice time during my stay in this small and beautiful hotel. The room landscapes are great. Don't hesitate to book right now. It's breakfast is full and fresh of course not the same as 4 or more stars hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Alireza,  Thank you for your succinct description of our property. Our staff tries it's best to smile and help our guests have as pleasant a stay as possible, and we are glad that our efforts were noticed by you!   We are also proud of our excellent breakfast options... we know how important it is to start your day off on the right foot!  Thanks again for your review. We greatly look forward to your next stay!

Summary Heading: Pet friendly, great breakfast, and they have a SPA!
Summary: So Zen, that will be your first comment. The lobby is warm and smell amazing from the essential oils they carry in the Spa. The staff is warm and friendly, and was quite accommodating. The hotel room we chose had a mini kitchen (sink, microwave and min stove). The place is quiet, clean and has a convenient hot tub and pool. The pool temp was perfect, as was the hot tub. I like to alternate between the two temps and do either stretching or calisthenics between. They didn't have a gym per se, but who cares. Walk, exercise, shower then hit the hot tub.  They even bake cookies at night and have them available for guests! In the morning you can get a to-go breakfast bag or have them make omelets to order.  The hotel is walking distance from a starbucks, if you like to hit starbucks.
Manager Response: Dear Mark H,  Thanks so much for your inspired review!  We definitely consider ourselves to be proprietors of zen, as anyone who walks into our lobby can tell and we are grateful for your appreciation of these traits.   We are also glad that you noticed that we are pet friendly, and since it's clear that to most Americans pets are more family than property we along with many in the hospitality industry are examining what that means for us and our guests. We definitely allow pets to accompany our guests and charge a comparatively low $20 a night pet fee. Due to the prevalence of pet allergies we do a intensive dander cleaning apart from our regular thorough room cleaning and this fee covers the extra cost that imposes. I'll also take the time to mention that we are very vigilant about noise and do not hesitate to contact guests who's furry children cause disturbances to other guests, and we are also keep close track of room assignments to further mitigate noise issues, regardless of how rare they are.   Thank you again for staying with us and leaving us such a nice review. We hope to earn your business again in the future!  -"I love cats because I enjoy my home; and little by little, they become its visible soul."    -Jean Cocteau

Summary Heading: Great staff, great hotel and pet friendly!
Summary: I am in the pet business and frequently travel with my dogs.  Finding a quality hotel such as the Prominence suites has been a fantastic experience and I now stay here every time I am in town.  Most hotels in the area limit the size of the pets to 20 lbs or less and charge ridiculous pet fees, but Prominence is fairly priced and no size restriction on the dogs (some breed restrictions, however).  The staff is all great, but particularly the Front Desk Lead Steve who is very accommodating.  All the rooms have kitchens and they provide dishes and cookware if you don't feel like dining out.  This place is a hidden gem for either the business or pleasure traveler!
Manager Response: Dear Gary G,  Wow! Thank you so much for your awesome review of our hotel. As you know, here at the Prominence pets are family and we are so happy we can give you a place to land when you're in town.   We are also happy to hear that our dish packs are proving to be a valuable amenity to you during your stays.   Thank you very much for the kind comments about our staff as well. And please let us know about any room preferences you develop during your stays with us.   "How lucky I am to have something that makes saying goodbye so hard."   -Winnie the Pooh

Summary: I chose to stay at the Prominence for a business trip (visiting my company's office near the Irvine Spectrum) after the expense report from my last trip (where I stayed at the Hilton Doubletree near the Spectrum) was met with raised eyebrows at my frugally-minded company. I found The Prominence to be a perfectly acceptable place to crash for a night without breaking the bank. Do be forewarned that the hotel isn't without a few quirks, though. If that sort of thing bothers you, you might want to book elsewhere.  The good: * The hot breakfast (with the omelet bar) was great, as mentioned in other reviews. * The hotel doesn't charge for parking, unlike some of the big chain hotels closer to the Irvine Spectrum. * Free wifi * I liked the room setup with the suite and kitchenette
Manager Response: Dear mpeterson74,   A review of this length and depth is always a joy to read and a big help, thank you for your meticulous and thorough review of your stay at our little hotel.  We here at the Prominence LOVE frugally minded companies because once they discover us they always come back.  We too consider ourselves quirky and this is reflected in our extensive green initiatives that happen mostly behind the scenes! We recycle everything from our newspapers to our lightbulbs and batteries to do our part to keep our local water sources and beaches contaminant free. We source as many disposable products as possible from manufacturers that utilize recycled and recyclable materials, and the vast majority of our cleaning products are similarly environmentally friendly. Soon we will even be partially powered by solar panels.  We are sorry that you found our elevator slow. For (hopefully) future reference you can find stairs at either end of our building. We are similarly sorry that you found the lack of kitchen supplies in your room unaccommodating. Not all of our guest utilize our kitchens, and frankly it would be time-intensive and expensive to maintain a full array of supplies in every room. The only thing I would mention on this matter is that we always have enough "dishkits", pots/pans, and cooking utensils for our guests who request them, and if at booking you know that you'll be needing them, it would be our absolute pleasure to place them in your room to await your arrival. I will still give this issue much thought as it has been mentioned before.   Lastly, I would like to apologize for the really difficult shower knob you encountered. As soon as I read this comment I had our maintenance technician start to examine every room at our hotel for this issue and we are happy to say that we replaced several shower knobs - thanks to your review!  Like I mentioned before this was a very helpful review. We are thankful for the high praise and thorough evaluation you gave us and I really hope you'll be staying with us again in the future. Also, if you are interested in helping your company stay frugal, we do offer very competitive and low corporate rates and direct billing, have someone email or give us a call and we would be happy to let you know what we can offer.  "There's no rock show, okay? I just said that so Marie wouldn't freak."   -ASAC Hank Schrader

Summary Heading: Surprisingly spacious and comfortable for a low price
Summary: The lobby is strange - full of Chinese things and amethyst geodes but what the heck.  The rooms are suites with the usual two TVs and kitchenette.  The bedroom had a good bed, great black out curtains and a nice air conditioner for white noise so you sleep well.
Manager Response: Dear Gwen88,  Thank you so much for your review! Your kind comments about our property will certainly let others know about our little gem and we so appreciate it. Please let us know if we can accommodate you again in the future, it would be our absolute pleasure to do so!  "Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated."  Confucius

Summary: We recently checked in to this hotel late in evening.  Following morning discovered that back seat had been stolen from locked 2014 Suburban.  Hotel manager was no help and relayed that security cameras "were not working"  that night.   $2000 seat replacement makes it a very expensive stay.

Family came to town and couldn't stay with us.  We couldn't stay in house either due to work.  Used to stay at other hotel in Lake Forest, closer to freeway but bad experience last time, so looked around.  THIS IS A GEM!  Warm friendly staff.  Great Breakfast.  Family member got sick and front desk couldn't do enough for us.  Extended their stay at previous rate for as long as they needed the room, which turned out to be only one extra day.  If you are into rocks, they have quite the collection to admire!  We will return.
Manager Response: Dear BRubin510,  Its unfortunate you had visitors when you yourself had to vacate your home - but we are thrilled that you chose us as your home away from home during your construction, especially after another local bad experience! I am proud to say that it is a very common occurrence for our competitors to provide us with many guests, as it speaks to our good value and staff, so thank you for choosing us!   It was our pleasure to help make your family member as comfortable as possible, and I am sure our staff will be very pleased to hear about your very high praise of their conduct.   Lastly, thanks for complementing our lovely little lobby Amethyst collection, hope you got some good selfies!  "Certainly, travel is more than the seeing of sights; it is a change that goes on, deep and permanent, in the ideas of living."   -Mary Ritter Beard

Summary: We travel quite a bit around the country and abroad, but when we stay local (SoCal) we have a vast selection of hotels. Now in the OC we typically enjoy the Ayres Inn's but NOW we've found their match! The Prominence Hotel & Suites was a wonderful surprise! Large spacious rooms, in room fridge,  cooktop stove, hard wired touch screen computer, free Internet access, 2 (yes 2) TVs, plenty and I mean plenty of space! Oh, and the included cook - to - order breakfast was amazing! No complaints here, and for the price you can't beat it! We found our OC hotel and looking forward to visiting again real soon!
Manager Response: Dear Phil A,  Thank you so much for your great and thoughtful review!  Here at the Prominence we love showing travelers what we have to offer because more often then not they are happy and impressed with the value and quality of their stay, and I am ecstatic that this was the case for you two as well! It is high honor to be added to your roster of local lodges, especially highly regulated chains such as the Ayre's brands. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the room amenities made available to you. Not all of our room types have all those amenities, so when re-booking please feel free to give our clerks a call so we can make sure you have everything you need for your stay.  Thanks again for the kind review. Mention that your a returning guest next time you stay with us so that we can make sure you have the most valuable discounts possible, and of course book directly for maximum savings.  "The world is a book, and those who do not travel read only a page."   -Saint Augustine

Summary Heading: Quiet, Convenient Hotel with the Best Breakfast
Summary: The Prominence Hotel is an ideal location for rest and relaxation. The room was clean & comfortable. Staff were exceptionally friendly. A free made-to-order breakfast that was the best hotel breakfast I've had. Coffee was good enough that no trip to the next-door Starbucks was necessary. Highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Peaceycat,  Thank you so much for your kind review! We are not a large hotel, but we here at the Prominence do our absolute best to make sure every guest is provided with everything they need to have the best stay possible. While we serve rainforest approved coffee during breakfast time and in our rooms, we agree that it is certainly nice that there is a Starbucks right in our lot!   Thank you again for choosing to stay with us! We hope to serve you again in the future.  “Be vigilant; guard your mind against negative thoughts” -Buddha

Summary: What a great find!  The price was great, with our AAA discount and the amenities were as good or  better than any 4 or 5 diamond AAA hotel we have paid 2 or 3 times as much for in the past.  The lady who makes made to order omelettes in the morning is excellent and the rooms, although a little tight, are exactly what we look for in a room, which is basically enough room to sleep and a TV to watch some late night movies.  This is a Schiller family 5 star rating.  Book it and enjoy!  Thanks for the great stay and friendly environment.
Manager Response: Dear Chris S,  Thank you so much for deciding to stay at our little property. As you noticed we are very competitively priced and we proudly consider ourselves to be the best deal in Lake Forest. I will be extending your thanks to our lovely breakfast staff who work hard to pump out yummy omelettes for our hungry travelers. Thank you again very much, we greatly appreciate your business!  "He who knows, does not speak. He who speaks, does not know. - Lao Tzu"

Summary: The Prominence Hotel is amazing. The price is spot on when it comes to the area, considering there is an Extended Stay right down the street and a Hampton and Marriot around the corner. I had just stayed with Extended Stay and Hampton and I found that not only were the rooms nicer, but the customer service at the Prominence was leagues above the others. I had the pleasure of actually staying in multiple room types due to multiple stays with The Prominence and all their rooms are extremely comfortable. The room accommodations are excellent and enjoyable as well; ample space, plush beds and even a computer in each room! The facility is clean and well maintained, and the breakfast is great! What really sets it apart though is the staff, my interactions with Steve and Daisy were
Manager Response: Dear Lost at Sea,  Thank you so much for your kind review! It was a real pleasure having you stay with us. We love our breakfast too, so we're glad it's hitting the spot with our guests as well. I should note a small disclaimer however,  not all of our rooms have computers, but of course if you need one we are happy to do our best to accommodate any guest request.  Thank you again for your visit,  we are already looking forward to your next visit!  “Your sacred space is where you find yourself again and again.” Joseph Campbell

Summary: The Prominence Hotel offered great costumer service! The breakfast was amazing. I definitely recommend checking out this hotel. My room was clean and quiet and the staff was friendly and helpful! Thank you for the great stay !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Kathrynnn81,  Thank you so much for the kind review! Our staff works hard to make sure your stay is as pleasant as possible. We almost never get noise complaints, so I'm glad this applied to your stay as well! What can we say? We have good "bones"!  Thank you for complimenting our staff's service as well. We train hard to make sure our customer service is second to none and I'm glad this shined through a little during your stay.   If you find yourself in need of a room in our area again we would be honored to host you again!  “I have come back again to where I belong; not an enchanted place, but the walls are strong.” -D.Rath

Summary: The reason for my stay was due to my mother's illness.  I was looking for something close to her hospital and her house, as well as a hotel that was reasonable.  The hotel room was phenomenal.  There was a separate seating area as well as a full kitchen.  It was basically a bachelor apartment.  The staff was also very welcoming and were very sympathetic with regards to my situation and allowed me to come late at night even though that was not standard policy.  I would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Danateach,  Thank you very much for the kind review. We were honored to host you during your stay with us, and on on a personal note, your strength of character is so admirable we consider ourselves lucky to have witnessed it. Thank you for your kind words as well, and should you ever need a temporary home in Lake Forest again it would be our honor to host you.

Summary: Just stayed last week.  We had a good stay with no complaints.  BREAKFAST IS AWESOME!  Fast made to order omelets, pancakes, bacon, etc . . .  Close enough to OC beaches.  Two room suite was reasonable for the area.
Manager Response: Dear Brian,  Thank you a lot for the kind review! We get quite a bit of our business from people that read our reviews so we really appreciate yours! We agree, our breakfast is amazing (in fact, I have an extra 5lbs on me because of it ;-) and we are all really glad that you enjoyed it, as well as your room.   Should you find yourself in the area again, it would be our honor to host you again!

Summary: We booked this hotel because of the great value and the fact that it was relatively close to shopping, beach communities and dining.  When we drove up I was a bit doubtful seeing that it was an older hotel and in a basically residential area.  The lobby needs a bit of redecorating to bring it up to date but still clean and comfortable.  The service was excellent and the staff extremely helpful.  The rooms are suites but a bit tight compared some others.  Yet it had everything we needed - refrigerator, microwave and even a stove if you want to be able to cook for yourself.  Everything was clean and the bed was incredibly comfortable. Overall it was a good value and a nice stay.
Manager Response: Dear Pleasure,  Thank you so much for you kind review. We here at the Prominence Hotel try our best to meet our guest's  expectations and I am very happy to read that in your case we did a pretty good job. Thank you for the kind compliments about our staff as well, we train vigorously and frequently to make sure we are prepared and ready for our guests when they arrive.  Thanks again and should you need a room in the area it would be our pleasure to host you again!

Summary: I almost dread posting this review; I fear it will mean I have trouble getting a room in the future, but I must say this is a very good hotel and in my opinion the best in Lake Forest.    Pros:  Large, well furnished rooms.  Bed, very large and comfortable.  Little kitchenette with two burners, a sink, microwave, apartment sized refrigerator and plenty of cabinet space.  AC and internet worked great.  Nice big screen television.  Housekeeping very accommodating with fresh towels and offers to service room.  Fantastic breakfast served daily: omelets, bacon, waffles, cereals, coffee, juices and more.  Dining room staff very nice and helpful.  Low cost washing machines and dryers.  Front desk staff very helpful and pleasant.  Safe location.  Lots of shopping and restaurants to the
Manager Response: Dear Chuck,  Thank you SOOO much for the amazing review.  We really try our best to make every guest have a pleasant experience here, and it was particularly nice having you stay with us. Also we definitely agree that our breakfast is awesome and our housekeepers are second to none. The next time you find yourself in our neck of the woods it would be our honor to host you again!

Summary: Awesome,  excellent  customer service,  your staff made my stay so memorable,  made my check in process so easy.....most likely I will be back on my next business trip back to lake forest.  Staff also made my getting  a cab to the airport non stressful.
Manager Response: Dear divamary40,  Thank you so much for your kind review. Our staff knows that when you're traveling for work a friendly face and efficient service might make or break your trip, so we really appreciate you letting us know that we are hitting the mark. I hope you enjoyed our unique breakfast, and please let us know if we can host you again in the future!  P.S. Let us know if you need a cab next time you fly in, we are always happy to arrange it!

Summary: I thought I'd like to try an individually owned hotel rather than a chain, where I usually stay.  I was not disappointed, and would definitely stay here again.  Rooms were large, including the bathroom, work desk was nice sized with fast internet, lighting was good, espec. in the bathroom.  Mattress was comfortable.  Breakfast was better than at a chain hotel, and the made-to-order omelet lived up to its promise.
Manager Response: Mr. Bill,  Firstly, may I say what a pleasure it was to have you stay with us.   Thank you so much for the kind review, these reviews go a long way to helping a small business like ours thrive, so we really appreciate you taking the time to let us know we did a good job. I remember you saying that your visits to socal are uncommon, but should the need arise again we would be honored to have you stay with us. Until then, please take care, and thank you again for the kind review.

Summary: My stay was excellent above what I expected the staff especially Daisy was great when we checked in she filled us in on the local attractions. She went above and beyond to accommodate any speacial requests. Will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Snowfalls90,  Thank you so much for the kind review! We agree that Daisy is really great guest services representative and we are proud to have her with us.  I hope you had a chance to enjoy our wonderful breakfast and the rest of our facilities.   Please be sure to let us know if we can serve you again in the future!

Summary: My wife and stayed the weekend of 9/19/14 and enjoyed our stay. The fridge was large and the beds were comfortable. The laundry ONLY cost $1 and the front desk provided the soap. Overall, I felt like I was home.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review Alseely!  We're really glad you stayed with us, and we appreciate that you found our laundry facilities useful. Free soap and low cost washer and dryer machines are just one of the many ways we like to save our guests as much money as possible.  We are honored that we were able to make you feel at home and we hope we have the chance to host you again!

Summary: Steve at the front is awesome. He was so polite and accommodating. It is an older hotel but still clean and smelled so good. The room was huge and the bathroom was big as well and also very clean. The DVD, large fridge, breakfast, and set up of the room was wonderful. I stay in hotels at least once a month in south orange county and this has been one of the best locations for the price I have been at. I would very much recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Mal M,  Thank you so much for your kind review, and for your comments about me specifically.   It was our pleasure having you stay with us and it makes it all the more wonderful knowing that we did such a good job hosting you. I'll be letting housekeeping know what a great job they are doing, and thank you again for noticing our hard work. Please think of us if you need to stay in the area again, it would be our honor to host you once more.

Summary: I'm very happy I chose to stay here. The staff is so friendly and professional. The rooms are great. I love the breakfast too, so convenient. I would definitely stay here again and will next time i come down.
Manager Response: Dear Chris D,  Thank you very much for your kind review! We here at the Prominence Hotel strive to provide exceptional service to every guest that walks through our front door and I'm ecstatic that we were able to provide that for you on your stay with us. We agree that our breakfast is an amazing deal, saves you time and money when your first meal of the day is amazing, and included with your stay with us. Please let us know if we can host you again in the future, have you stay with us was a pleasure!

Summary: I checked into the hotel on Sept. 9th Tuesday.  I had a contract job in Lake Forest for the week.  I checked out on Sept. 13th Saturday.  Steve who works at the front desk was extremely professional and courteous in handling my reservation.  He was able to give me a discount.  I initially made the first night of the reservation through booking.com.  After checking in, I decided to stay through Friday.  Steve gave me a discount without me asking for it.  It was great and unexpected that I was given a discount by Steve.  The room was awesome and it was very clean very day.  Housekeeping did a great job.  Daisy was also friendly and had a great smile at the front desk.  She greeted me every morning every time I pass the front desk before I get to work.  This is the first time I've
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Ron R,  I can't thank you enough for your kind comments. We try our very best to make sure all of our guests are comfortable, and pleased with their accommodations here, and guests such as yourself are a pleasure to host. I am very pleased that you found our hotel clean and our service above and beyond. Please let us know if you find yourself in Lake Forest again, it would be our pleasure to have you stay with us again!

Summary Heading: Great Room, Great Staff, Comfy Bed
Summary: Great room  Very nice and helpful staff Comfy bed Nice laundry facility as well Great pool  Walking distance from Starbucks, Subway and other great restaurants Suite quality atmosphere for average to above average room rates
Manager Response: Hello Mr. Jeremia,  Thank you for your kind review! We are only a small hotel, but we try our best to make our hotel as accommodating and enjoyable as possible. I will pass on your comment about our rooms to our housekeepers, and I certainly appreciate the kind comment about our staff.  Please let us know if we can host you again in the future, It was our pleasure having you stay at our hotel.

Summary Heading: Good room, amazing staff, can't complain!
Summary: I stayed at here on Memorial Day weekend and my stay couldn't possibly be any better. The room was clean and spacious, the staff was very helpful and friendly, and the breakfast exceeded my expectations by far. I definitely do recommend this place!
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you very much for your kind review! We appreciate you taking the time to write a review for us and we are very happy we were able to host your satay in Lake Forest. We are a small hotel, and a small team, but we work very hard to make sure you feel at home here and I'm glad we contributed to what I hope was a prosperous and enjoyable trip. Maybe the Fung Shui power of our Amethyst collection helped? Who knows!  Thanks Again!  Steve Perez  “Your sacred space is where you find yourself again and again.” Joseph Campbell

Summary: The room is almost average Furniture is old seems like the hotel is at least 20 years old Breakfast is very poor variety and quality, coffee is terrible  Water with lemon is a nice gesture at the entrance  Free wifi Free parking Located by Starbucks
Manager Response: Dear Mal M,  Thank you so much for your kind review, and for your comments about me specifically.   It was our pleasure having you stay with us and it makes it all the more wonderful knowing that we did such a good job hosting you. I'll be letting housekeeping know what a great job they are doing, and thank you again for noticing our hard work. Please think of us if you need to stay in the area again, it would be our honor to host you once more.

Summary Heading: Surely adequate for 'just passing through' the area.
Summary: Because I had an early meeting in the Lake Forest area (Orange County, CA), I looked for a nearby hotel (for only one night) in close proximity to the meeting location.  The Prominence Hotel and Suites would rate a 3 star from my perspective.  Though the room felt like 120 degrees when I first entered it, the in-room A/C did eventually cool it down.  The bed was "fine"- neither comfortable nor uncomfortable, as was the on-site breakfast (typical in nature, but nice to have).  Overall, it deserved a solid "3", which met my needs for a one night stay.  Had my stay been for more than one night, I probably would have looked for a more "comfortable" hotel and drove a bit further up the road. What was a nice touch (and unusual) was an actual in-room desk computer for guest use.  I
Manager Response: Dear Mr. West W,  Thank you very much for your review. To answer the unasked question, yes our wifi is free. Our made-to-order breakfast is also included with your stay as is parking.   Our hotel rooms all offer mini-kitchenettes which include microwaves, sinks, fridges and stove top burners upon request which definitely come in handy for many of our long term guests. In fact, we even have kitchen kits with cutlery and dishes, pots and pans free of charge.  Should you find yourself in the area again we would be honored to host you again!

Summary: Due to a neighborhood power outage, I called the Prominence and got the last room!  Even asked if I had AAA to get a discount.  Very pleasant staff and clean room.  Maybe needed a little fresh paint, otherwise great last minute stay.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your kind review!  We know you had many choices to decide from when you needed to escape the house, and appreciate that you picked us!  We are honored when locals regularly decide to stay with us, and recommend us to family members. We are here to serve.

Summary: The young woman who assisted me with special requests when I made the reservation was cheerful, friendly, and helpful.  The young man who checked us in was also cheerful, friendly, and helpful.  The room was clean, and nicely laid out.  I would stay there again.

This hotel was selected for me while on a business trip to Lake Forest. I sincerely hope it is not Lake Forest's finest. The decor and amenities tag it as an older hotel; however, they do have free wifi. The lighting left something to be desired as the room was still dark with every light turned on. I guess the place was clea, it was really too dimly lit to tell.  The "suite" was equipped with a sitting area and a mini-kitchen (fridge, electric stove, microwave, and sink). If you really wanted to cook something (I didn't) you have to go to the front desk for the necessary utensils, Thankfully no one near my room was cooking although I would not have blamed them as there are no good restaurants nearby -- just Starbucks.

We were here for a swim meet with our 2 children ages 5 & 10. Upon arrival, there was a mistake with our room however the stay was still convenient. Nice size mini fridge, microwave and small stove top. The place was relatively clean and in the same parking lot as a Starbucks! For those who have coffee needs. Breakfast was really good however for our needs, my son and husband were unable to enjoy their breakfast because they had to leave by 6:40 to be to the pool on time for warm ups. The breakfast starts at 6:30 weekdays and 7 weekends so for us, and our needs, it was a bit difficult for all to enjoy. Staff was pleasant and helpful.

My family stayed here because it was the best rate we could find and we needed to be close to the Verizon Amphitheater.  I'm not sure what we were expecting but we have been pleasantly surprised. We got in late and our reservation was held just fine. We were upgraded rooms and it was nice to get away from the kids when we went to bed as our king bed was in a separate room. Breakfast was great, wifi and parking were both free as well. Just one minor thing, I would redo the wallpaper, seemed to be coming off in a couple places. Overall great stay!

This hotel is a good value for what you get.  I stayed about a month ago and while I had an issue with a broken pullout couch, they promptly supplied me with a deluxe cot (free) and tried their best to make me happy.  It is not overly frilly but you get what you need and a bit more (i.e. kitchenette, deluxe breakfast).  The price is very reasonable for the area.   The most exeptional part of this hotel is the hot made to order breakfast.  I don't think I ever waited more than 5 minutes to get a custom order and it was very good.
Manager Response: Dear Clinton F,  Thank you so much for your kind review! Our staff is really proud of how our hard works comes together to make every stay as pleasant and seamless as possible. Thanks for calling our Roll-away beds deluxe. They are quite nice and we just bought half a dozen of them for when situations like yours arise (Normally a small nominal fee applies). Thanks for complementing our breakfast too! Glad to hear it didn't take you long to get your order. Made to order breakfast is another aspect of our little hotel that makes us different and better than our competitors!   Thanks again for staying with us and leaving us such a wonderful review. We really appreciate your business!

Summary: Extremely helpful staff. Great breakfast. Very comfortable bed. Nice connectivity to the internet. Great Shuttle service. Perfect for overnight stay or and extended stay of months. Have decent kitchen in the room for cooking.
Manager Response: Mr. Jalpesh,  Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us on your international trip. We try very hard to give our hotel and guests an "at home" feeling and we very much hope you felt at home during your stay. You are very kind to reference those aspects of your stay that you enjoyed, such as a our great breakfast, our wifi, and the helpfulness of our staff.  We are grateful for your business and we hope we get the chance to host you again in the future!

Summary Heading: DO NOT BOOK HERE! PLEASE READ!
Summary: DO NOT EVER BOOK HERE! We stayed here on 07.19.14 and it was a total nightmare!  Based on pictures and phone recording, we were excited to arrive.  Once checked in, this all changed!  Room smelled like DEATH!  I contacted housekeeping, who "sprayed" the carpets.  We opened a window and left for dinner.  Upon our return, the room was not only humid and stuffy, the smell was UNBEARABLE!  In an effort to get rid of the smell, we turned on the AC.  NOT! It was BROKEN!! While trying to work on the AC, my husband found the source of the smell.. MOLD!  The carpets under and around the broken AC were all damp and MOLDY!  The carpet in the sitting area DAMP AND MOLDY!  We immed called the front desk to request a room change.  Nope.  Hotel "Booked." Not one place to move us.  Allergies

Summary Heading: Ok for a 1 night no frills stay
Summary: Looking at the other reviews, I am kind of surprised that there are so many 5 star reviews!  This hotel was alright at best.  It is very no frills.  On the plus side is the service. It's great!  Also the breakfast is very decent. And, my room and the hotel were very clean.  The room also has a refrigerator and a computer. Although the computer is a nice touch, it is not necessary...who in this day and age doesn't travel with their own laptop/tablet/smart phone?  On the down side, the hotel does not have its own restaurant or bar ( there are many choices within walking distance), and the hotel, while very clean, shows it's age in little ways. For example, the room fixtures are older and dulled, there are bits of peeling wall paper here and there, and the air conditioner is very

I stay at The Prominence at least 2-3 times per month. It's my home away from home. I know everyone's name & they know mine. They are great! The rooms are good size & everything is so clean. Love the morning breakfast as well. I recommend The Prominence to anyone who wants that homey family atmosphere.

I am picky !! They pleased me in every way. Clean and great value.  We will be back. Did everything to make me happy. I research rooms near San Clemente. Found everything I was looking for. And a great price too
Manager Response: Dear Wayman family,  Thank you so much for your visit to our hotel! It was an absolute pleasure having you here, and we really appreciate your business. Please let us know if we can accommodate you in the future, and be sure to mention you've stayed with us before!

Summary Heading: Sorry, but this was a complete disappointment
Summary: I make a point of trying to write positive reviews, but I don't have a single good thing to say about this hotel.  It was billed on Hotwire as a a three star hotel, and the room promised was supposed to be a suite with two queen beds.  When we arrived, they did not have any such rooms left, just a king and a foldout.  On top of that there was a large chair that prevented us from folding the foldout bed all the way.  Moreover, this hotel had a distinct smell like it had just been cleaned out after a flood, or fumigated or something.  And the pool was extremely small and uninvited, located in the back adjacent to the parking lot.  Finally, the elevator sounded like it was about to fall off the rails. This hotel might qualify as a 2 star hotel at best, and will do if you're
Manager Response: Dear PHXJC463,  I am so sorry that we at The Prominence weren't able to fit your needs for your recent trip. In your review, you mention that you booked through the third party booking service called Hotwire, and you also mention that you booked a room with two queen beds but received a room with only a king bed and a pullout sofa. We take issue with that statement. We honor all the reservations made with our property as they come to us, we never "bait and switch" our guests under any circumstances ever. In fact, it is impossible for you to have booked a room with two queen beds via Hotwire, as we control what they are allowed to sell, and we have only ever allowed Hotwire to sell rooms with a single king bed. The vast majority of our rooms have sofa pull-out beds, this is just one aspect of our rooms that makes us a little different, and a little better from other properties (we also have kitchenettes, and free wifi in every room!).  In any case, sometimes guests find that they booked a room that doesn't fit their needs and in those cases we do our absolute best to accommodate them at our hotel regardless of whether or not they booked with us, third parties, or even telepathically. However, because of availability constraints (we were sold out) we were only able to honor the reservation you yourself reserved. Our housekeeping department is the most thorough imaginable in the service industry. Every floor is cleaned daily, and the air freshener used in our rooms is a rather expensive, all natural eucalyptus essential oil. We have never been flooded or any such thing, and we receive very high praise in these regards daily.  In regards to our pool, I'm sorry that the size of our pool's size is not satisfactory to your needs. Most of our guests park in front of our  hotel where the vast majority of our parking is, however we do have a limited amount of additional parking that is located in the back of our hotel, there are five spaces at both "sides" of the pool. Lastly, our hotel's elevator has never presented issues and is inspected as mandated by law. I have to admit however that it isn't the fastest elevator in the world, it recently clocked in at 15 seconds going from pushing the button on the ground floor to the doors opening fully on the third floor, but we do have convenient stairs at both the east and west sides of our building for our more physically able guests to take advantage of. Regardless sir, we are very sorry we couldn't do more to keep you at our property, and we hope you give us another chance in the future.

Summary: Stayed here for a few days as I wound up a long vacation.   Located about 10 minutes from I-5.  5 minutes to Foothill Ranch Town Center perfect for all you shopping and dining needs ( just a note - if you use your GPS, do not go on the toll road to get there!)  Room was large.  King bed and adjoining seating area with couch and chair.  Unfortunately, I did not have one of the new upgraded rooms.  Kind of wished I had switched to one, especially since mine was next to the hotel's linens room.  A bit too noisy early in the AM.   In my room, the a/c unit seemed to run constantly despite the setting on the thermostat.  Unless you bring your own kitchen equipment, the two burner stove in the room makes no sense.  Nice sized flat screen TV for viewing.  Bed was comfortable but, for
Manager Response: Thank you for your very thoughtful review!  We really appreciate your feedback and I can assure you we use it to improve our operations on a daily basis.   I'm sorry you had some noise issues with your room, however minor. I spoke with our wonderful ladies in housekeeping about the noise that's made in the morning when they are going about their work, and they apologize if they were at any point inconsiderate. On the same note, if you stay with us at any point in the future and find yourself wishing you were in a different room, let us know!  It would be our pleasure moving you to a different room.  In regards to the AC noise, if the AC is on the 'fan' setting, it will run constantly, I'll be asking our maintenance man to check the unit out however.   Lastly, many of our short term guests don't utilize the kitchenette in our rooms, but we do have 'dish kits' we let guests use that contain a set of utensils, plates/bowls, and cleaning supplies that are available upon request. We also have a large amount of wide-ranging cookware(cast iron, stainless steel, and teflon)  that is similarly available free of charge.   We really appreciate your business and we hope to have you again.

Summary: Our whole soccer team stayed there for a soccer tournament. The staff was friendly & the rooms were nice. I don't usually give reviews but this place impressed me so much I felt I needed to. We had an early morning game on Sunday & we were not going to be able to get breakfast which opens at 7am and get to the game on time. So the staff went out of their way without us even asking to open a side conference room and had breakfast ready right before 7. They had us order our omelets the night before & all our omelets were ready on a table with our names. They also brought us extra eggs, bacon & pastries for a buffet style breakfast. I usually don’t like hotel breakfasts but this place really puts an effort into their food. The rooms were large and very clean. I would definitely

Our family stayed here last night! Hotel staff behind the counter was very nice. We had a computer in our room that made my husband happy. He could surf Ebay for hours. Room was clean and up to date. They had someone there cooking omelets to order one day and the next was breakfast sandwiches. Also other breakfast chose's. Definitely would come back !

Summary Heading: Friendly staff, good location, clean & ample rooms. Good value.
Summary: Breakfast included in room price is varied, well prepared & a great way to start the day without the added expense of a restaurant breakfast. Cook posts a special of the day or will happily do a custom omelette. Suitable or adult or kids tastes.  Rooms a little outdated but since your not paying top dollar it's a good compromise. Maids do a through job every day. Wifi & computer in our room very handy. Suites with separate bedroom available as are kitchenettes. Guest laundry facilities on site. Plenty of restaurants & shopping within a few minutes drive. Has only 3 floors with easy elevator access. Pool small but clean & kids seem to enjoy the time there.

Comfortable beds and clean room, but both days we stayed water ran scalding hot for 30 seconds and then freezing cold, switching back to hot and then cold for the entire (very brief because it was so bad!) shower. Complained the first day and they fixed it for the husband. Second day did it again, this time to both of us (we had to check out to get somewhere, no time to complain and get it fixed). Asked for a discount on the room for the major inconvenience. Got a Starbucks gift card (I don't drink coffee) and an apology, but no discount on the room. A comfortable shower is one of the most important things about the hotel stay. I would have liked a discount. I wrote after the stay and they offered a free night. I live in Ohio and won't be back so this was useless. They should

Recently stayed here as part of a business trip that included use of their meeting room. Everything was great! They made sure that we had everything we needed and were very prompt in following up. It made our job much easier in the process. The rooms itself were spacious, clean and comfortable. The staff was always smiling and the breakfast was a nice surprise with different breakfast specials each morning! What the Prominence lacks in pizazz they make up for in service and comfort. I would definitely stay here again!

It has been quite some time since we last stayed here, but I thought it would be worth it to give a more current review.  We had room 206 on the end of the 2nd floor.  It was quiet, very clean, just a really nice room.  We had a chair and couch seating area, a large refrigerator, microwave, flat screen TV......and something new......we had our own PC in the room.  Our friends stayed here as well and their room was the same.  Breakfast, which was included was one of the better ones...... they have a cook station where they will cook you an omelet or pancakes, and there were all the other assortments of cereals, breads, waffles etc.  So if breakfast is an important feature to you......this is the place to stay.  Would we stay here again.............ABSOLUTELY.

Summary Heading: Terrible for more than a 1 night stay
Summary: After driving 17 hours, we were looking forward to the nice comfortable bed that is shown in the pictures. We could feel the springs through the additional mattress pad they had on top. The comforter was nothing but a sheet of fabric with no filling. I had to use the extra blanket in the closet just to keep warm. The location is completely off the beaten path and is a maze just to get to it. The staff were not personable at all. The free breakfast was not even a breakfast. They barely had any selections. The décor is completely outdated and kind of strange. It is not bad for a 1 night business stay, however, I would have rather paid the extra $30 a night for a hotel closer to the water. I left more stressed than I when I showed up. Very disappointing.

The hotel staff were very friendly and welcoming upon arrival which I appreciated because in other hotels I have stayed at the staff don't even look at you when they talk to you and hardly crack a smile.  The room was clean and fresh and offered free Wi-Fi, free parking and free breakfast which is great value for money.  The only thing I could say in a negative comment is that the A/C was a bit noisy in the room and I could also hear the A/C from the neighbouring room.

I have been staying at this hotel for atleast 30 days a year since 2006-7 when it was a part of the Comfort Suites chain.   A very comfortable and homely hotel . Right from the reception desk to the brilliant guy & the beautiful lady in the breakfast kitchen in the mornings to the smiling housekeeping staff.  They make you feel right at home , which is what anyone missing home needs.   Will recommend this hotel anytime

I'm usually in the area during the holidays for work as someone has to be working while everyone else is off. I've stayed in a lot of the neighboring hotels and decided to give the Prominence a try. I'm glad I did because I could not be more happy with my stay. The prices were very comparable to everyone else in the area, and the breakfast was amazing! Hands down the best breakfast anywhere else. Cathy and the manager, Thong (great sense of humor!), had a great rapport and it was a pleasure to run into them anywhere in the building. The housekeeping was very thorough, the rooms were immaculately clean and the in-room touch screen computer was a nice additional touch. My only gripe would be the doors, as the keylocks were very sensitive. They are the only independent hotel in the

I recently stayed at the Prominence while in the area on business.  I had stayed six months prior and enjoyed my stay so decided to go back.  I couldn't believe that several staff members (breakfast staff, van shuttle, front desk) remembered my name and facts I had told them about myself six months earlier.  It made me feel right at home and also showed me how much they care about making their guests happy.  The hotel is in a great location and the rooms are clean and spacious.  You can't beat the price.

We don't like to spend a huge amount of money to get away from "the kids", the phone, the dogs, etc.  We like out one or two night local getaways and this was perfect.  Not too much money and the room had everything.   DVD player, refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker and a computer, not just Wi-Fi.  Very clean.  I heard about the cook to order breakfast and I smelled it, unfortunately I was unable to enjoy but next time I will fit that it.  Didn't interact with the staff all that much but when we did, they were very pleasant and helpful.

I have been staying at the Prominence for almost 6 months now on business.  I travel extensively for work both internationally and domestically.  I tend to stay at business suite type hotels such as Residence Inn and Homewood Suites.  I spend 40+ weeks a year in such properties.  First off, Prominence Inn has the best staff of any of the business suite type properties I have stayed at in my 30 year career.  The Property Manager Stan Yombo is a large, friendly man who is obviously liked by his staff and shows them respect.  That dynamic feeds through to the way the staff treats the guests.  The rooms are a bit on the small side for a suite hotel, but not cramped.  The house keeping staff are fastidious in their duties from the rooms to the rest of the property.  Juan, the Staff

We were pleasantly surprised by this "gem" of a hotel. On display in the lobby are a number of pieces of amethyst - very large ones standing on the floor and smaller ones on shelves. I was told they provide a tranquil atmosphere - and they do! The common areas are decorated with elegant antique-looking furniture. Our room was nicely appointed and comfortable. The breakfasts were very good and the front desk personnel were smiling and helpful. I would definitely stay here again.

Came here for a last minute night out. Received a complimentary upgrade to their Executive King Suite. Huge room with kitchen and computer...Thats right it came with a computer, that blows Free Wi-Fi out the door! Comfortable bed, spacious living room, a lot of cable channels for surfing. The breakfast was great. The chef made me a personal omelette. Based on the price and everything we got I would definitely return here again.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel with very helpful staff
Summary: Couldn't have asked for anything more from a hotel and it was one of the cheapest on our trip, the room was well above expectation more like a suite, with full kitchen area and separate lounge had seating for 3 and even a touch screen PC, the Manager at the front desk was extremely helpful when I missed a toll charge during our stay, the information he provided saved me a hefty fine I wish i had taken his name, the breakfast was more than adequate with hot egg dishes on offer, the only down side was the pool it was very much on the small side, but with great rooms and excellent staff this place offers excellent value for money

This hotel is siutated in a great spot.  Plenty of food options within walking distance.  Very good service.  The room I got was against the back that faced a hill.  At night it was perfectly quiet and ideal for sleeping with the window open, which I like to do.  The room was clean, large and very comfortable.  Great beds with plenty of pillows!  The bathroom was quite large with lots of counter space for toiletries.  The breakfast was not bad.  Not much in the way of fresh fruit but they offer made-to-order omelettes, any way you like.  The Fitness room is way too small and there is no A/C in there.  Not good when you're on the treadmill and someone else is in there sweatin' right next to you... literally!  One tip, take the stairs!  The elevator is SLOW and only useful when

Summary Heading: if you didn't like it, you were asking for too much
Summary: this place was clean and comfy. the bed was wonderful and so was the room. the breakfast room could stand to be a bit bigger but the breakfast was even decent. made to order omelettes and some toast what more could you ask for? seriously it was better than cold cereal. if you are expecting more, than spend more money and stay at a hilton.... honestly i've paid more money for places not nearly as nice as this place.

we travel to Laguna Hills quite often and are getting tired of paying the ever increasing price for the Ayres and do not like the Laguna Lodge.  So we decided to try this hotel.   Room was a decent size, full size refrigerator and microwave.  Fairly quiet. Breakfast had omelets to order and waffles etc.  Not much else to the hotel but worth the price

Very convenient location in Orange Co. Staff helpful and courteous. The rooms are well appointed, spacious and clean. We stayed there twice, both rooms had a small kitchenette. Included breakfast was OK if your on the run.

Summary Heading: Embarrasement to us and U.S. Terrible Experience
Summary: On Fri., July19, 2013, we called Prominence Hotel to confirm the booking we had reserved for Sat. July 20, 2013 for out of town guests from Dubai. After picking them up at L.A.X., we arrived at the Hotel at approximately 10:00 p.m.  Our guests were tired from travel and needed to rest so they could speak at our church the next morning.  The hotel told us the booking had been cancelled, and there were no rooms available. No one from our organization cancelled the room.    The front desk agent, and the rest of us searched online for another room in the area.  Except for a $430/night room, and a room one hour away, nothing was available.  The Hotel has made no effort to compensate us or rectify their error, not even so much as a simple apology.   We ended up bringing this family of
Manager Response: Dear beckyjack123,  I am concerned about the reservation issue you experienced at the Prominence Hotel and Suites during your recent visit. I am writing to thank you for taking the time to bring this matter to my attention.  We accommodate many guests each evening and we strive to make their stay a satisfying one. The principal goal of our hotel is to provide dependable service to all of our guests at reasonable prices. Consequently, it is disappointing to learn that you are unhappy.  Please accept my sincere apology.  I want you to know that the comments and suggestions we receive from our guests are taken seriously. They tell us what we are doing right, what we are doing wrong and how we can improve. Your willingness to share your recent experience is genuinely appreciated.  Please be assured that issues you have raised have been addressed, and the appropriate action has been taken.  Again, I want to thank you for taking the time to share your concerns with us.  Sincerely,

Summary: We were placed at this hotel thru work. We were pleasantly suprised and very pleased with the accomodations. The staff was extremely friendly and very proffessional. The breakfast they offer was really great. The entire staff was very welcoming and we felt really comfortable for our 5 day 4 nite stay. The Prominence Hotel is a must if you are summoned to Lake Forest...Everything felt very clean and everything was in working order. Great high speed access. Located walking distance from one of the best stocked liquer stores and the best food at RV Kabobs a must!! I especially enjoyed the hotel decor loved the crystals and all amenities.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your comment about your recent experience at The Prominence Hotel and Suites. We are always delighted to see new faces and hear about new experiences. Just for your information the Prominence Hotel and Suites offers a complimentary shuttle service Monday thru Friday 7AM to 6PM in a 5 Miles radius. Most of our corporate guests enjoy a ride to work during their stay. Let us know about your next visit and one of drivers will be delighted to drop you off to work.  Again Thank you for choosing the Prominence Hotel and Suites.  Regard,

Summary Heading: HARD TO PLEASE...AND I AM PLEASED
Summary: I am here with 2 pets. Being they accepted pets, I expected there to be a smell and noise. Neither!! Very clean and odorless.  Other than the occasional cart in the hallway, it is very quiet.  The staff is exceptionally nice and helpful.  The free breakfast is a plus with three entrée choices, plus eggs made to order and self made waffles, etc.  Room décor - ugh.  However, I have a King with kitchenette. It is useable.  However, their version of what you need to cook and eat with is limited.  Bring what you think you need to function. Starbucks/Subway in lot is a major perk!! Free WiFi and internet service works great and is fast. Flat screen tv w/ HBO & VCR.  Not a large suite - but, sufficient for my needs. A family of four might be too much. Little amenities like the jug of
Manager Response: What a lovely review! Wow and thank you! We are very happy that you enjoyed The Prominence Hotel and Suites and would love to have you to stay in our home again!  Please do contact me or my front desk staff when your travel brings you back in Orange County and in Lake Forest in particular so we can look after your reservation.   Thank you.

Summary: I stayed in the hotel for a month on 2 consecutive years, it was great that on my 2nd visit some of the staff still remembers me. It says a lot about their service. The front desk is very accommodating though I agree on a review that housekeeping did their minimal. The breakfast they offer is okay, you get tired after 2 weeks of going through their menu but ultimately I like my stay. The open air heated pool is great during the cold California weather season. The kitchen amenity they have on some rooms works great (though it would be great to have dishwashers).  I would recommend the hotel for some quick stop or long business travels, it offers a good service and nice enough rooms among the other hotels of the same category in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for posting your positive review and I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you also for pointing out our breakfast menu and the dishwasher.   We look forward to welcoming you back at the Prominence Hotel and Suites.  Best Regards,

Summary: My husband and I stayed at the hotel for 8 nights at the beginning of May 2013. This was a pleasure trip as we were helping our son move into the area. Like others, I selected the hotel because of the great reviews, but I thought the experience was nothing special except for the breakfast staff, they were exceptional. The breakfast staff was very friendly and went out of their way to make sure you had everything you needed. The cleaning staff, on the other hand, was not very friendly and cleaned the minimal amount every day. Every morning, if we were not out of our room by 830 she would slide a note under our door saying that we had to notify the front desk by 1:00p if we wanted our room clean. I think 8:30a is a little to early to assume that I don't want my room cleaned. Also,
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for posting your  review and I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed your breakfast during your stay with us.  Thank you also for pointing out our housekeeping service and please note these will be addressed.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the prominence hotel and suites if you trip bring you back at  The Lake Forest area.  Thank you again for your feedback.  Stan Yombo General Manager

Summary: We were in the area to play golf and this was a good location. Staff was very friendly and helpful. It has energy efficient lighting and took a few minutes to understand how it works -- very effective, wish we had at home.  The breakfast varied each day and was good. A quiet location.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We value your comments and are thankful you took the time to express your experience at the prominence Hotel and Suites.We are glad that you have chosen us as your home away home for your leisure.  Sincerely,  Stan Yombo General Manager

Summary: We were in town for  bicycle race and needed a place close to the race location and pet friendly. Prominence hotel worked out great for us, not only location, your average suburbia hotel, not too fancy, not too chainy just a good solid acomodation. Helpful and friendly staff is always a plus. There was breakfast provided and  good coffee wich was a pleasant surprise !
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review. We hope to be able to welcome you back to The Prominence Hotel and Suites in your future trip to lake Forest. Please contact us if you would like to stay with us again and I will ensure that we take good care of you.   Sincerely,

Summary: I stay on this hotel for 1 night. Location is great for Saddleback church, breakfast is cheap and ok. I had a room with nice computer and TV. DO NOT use the computer on your unit if you dont want your account to be hacked. I had all my accounts hacked couple hours I departed from this hotel... Im very disappointed and will never be back again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for posting your  review and I am really sorry to hear that the internet connection has ruined your  experience at the Prominence Hotel and Suites.  Here at the Prominence Hotel and Suites we offer a complimentary top tier High Speed internet connection but we do not guarantee a protection for the sites visited by our guests or we will have to block all access to the internet.   At the Prominence Hotel and Suites, we take all reviews seriously and make sure that they are properly addressed.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the prominence hotel and suites if you travels bring you back at  The Lake Forest area.  Thank you again for your feedback.  Stan Yombo General Manager

Summary Heading: Just wanted a room for the night.
Summary: My husband and I were moving and just wanted a quick room for the night as we were exhausted. Instead we found a room that I could have moved into. It was comfortable, clean and very well decorated. Everything you would need for an extended stay was there except a stove. The price was very reasonable and came with a full breakfast which made the price even better. I would stay there anytime again and highly recommend it to anyone.
Manager Response: Hi Barbara,  Thank you for such great review. We are glad that you have chosen the Prominence Hotel and Suites during your transition to a new place and that you have enjoy our cook to order breakfast.  We hope that you are enjoying your new home and thank you for recommending us to all readers.  If your travels brings you back in this area, feel free to contact us.  Sincerely,  Stan Yombo General Manager

Summary: I know this sounds weird but the sheets smelled so clean when I got into bed.  And everything else in the room was very clean too.  This is a good choice of hotel in the Irvine area.  People at the Front Desk were especially nice and helpful and I'm from Texas so I know nice.  Highly recommend this hotel.  Will stay there again during my upcoming relo to South OC.  Thanks y'all!
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review and Thank you for choosing the Prominence Hotel and Suites as your home away from Texas.  At the prominence Hotel and Suites we use Essential Oil(Natural Scent) in our rooms and our sheets are cleaned with no harsh chemicals.  Again, Thank you for staying with us and if you visit the great area of Lake Forest, do not hesitate to contact me or my front desk. We will make sure we make your stay enjoyable.  Sincerely,  Stan Yombo General Manager

Summary: My fiancé & I didn't have much of a Valentine's Day so I surprised him with an executive suite room for 2 days. We've stayed here on a few occasions & each time it was perfect. The staff is very friendly, the rooms are clean, the bathroom is decent size with earth tone hues. The beds are very comfy, probably the best I've slept on & their morning continental breakfasts feature hot items such as eggs, bacon, & sausage along with pastries. The hotel also has a pool, hot jacuzzi, wifi & flat screen tv's. In addition, the place is close to shopping & restaurants. It's truly a great value.
Manager Response: Dear Guest ,  It is an honor to hear that you have chosen the Prominence Hotel and Suites for a getaway during your Valentine's day weekend. Guest such as you make us proud to do what we do best serving our guests.  We thank you for your review and we hope that you will visit us again in a near future.  Thank you.  Stan Yombo General Manager

Summary: Kids had a sporting tournament in the area and this was the team hotel. We generally stay at the Marriott Irvine but decided to try this due to better location. Hotel staff was very friendly and helpful when I called to make reservation. Staff was also very friendly during our check-in and entire stay. Location was excellent and bonus of a Starbucks right next door!  Stayed in "exec suite" with kitchenette, sitting room, and  king bedroom. Was fine for our needs. I must agree with post about sofa bed. Sofa bed mattress completely  worn out and should be replaced. Kids were quiet uncomfortable.  Generally all the decor at the hotel is quiet worn out and in need of a total rehab. Carpets were dirty, sofa fabric very soiled, and general feeling of the hotel was dated and older. Not

I stayed for two weeks while receiving out patient cancer treatment. I can not say enough about how accommodating the staff was. From shuttling me to the Clinic, pharmacy and the grocery store. They also went out of their way to help me rent a car very last minute. The staff was friendly and very compassionate about my condition. The room was clean, comfortable and the breakfast was good. I would definitely stay again.

This hotel provided a wonderful stay for my time in the area. It was reasonably priced, clean, and near to the medical clinic where I needed to go. Not only was it close, but It offered free transportation to the clinic. The staff was very accommodating and tried to grant every request including a printout of directions to the nearest beach via local bus. The daily breakfast had variety, was tasty, and included hot items. In addition to breakfast, there were special treats, such as freshly baked cookies offered in the evening....free!  It was a pleasure to stay there. I can highly recommend this hotel.

This hotel is rated as a two star, but is better than most/many 4 star hotels. They are VERY accomodating. The hotel is exceptionally CLEAN and comfortable. The "cooked to order" breakfast is as advertised. There is an entire floor that has "PET FREE" rooms, as well as those on other floors that offer lodging to include pets.

This is one of the approved hotels for events happening at Saddleback Church. I was involved in an event there, Share Da Aloha 2012.  We were the only halau staying there. We needed last minute practice and they generously let us use an available conference room to dance.   I was the one who recommended this hotel out of the many that Saddleback has preference rates for since I used to be a travel agent and was impressed with the information provided on their website.  We were able to secure their remodeled rooms. I got to see a few different rooms since I was staying with a group and they were all nice. Our Kumu Hula advised us prior to arrival that the lobby was a little weird as the lobby was dominated by amethysts for sale and other miscellaneous geodes. Whoever on staff

Took up the advance payment option. Great value, very comfortable, well equipped room. Friendly, helpful staff. Would definitely stay there again. Were visiting family, but are non-drivers in USA. Hotel on a bus route with good links to rest of the transport system. Also some great walking within easy reach.

We had our small dog with us and this was a great place to stay (especially for the price - call to see if they have any specials).  They were very accommodating and the staff was incredibly helpful.  The hotel felt safe and secure, even though we were on the 1st floor.  The breakfast had cooked to order omelets that were really tasty!  I would stay here again and recommend it.  Regarding the pull-out sofabed - yes, it would be very tight walking by if you left it open, but we just closed it up during the day so it wasn't a problem.

Currently staying a couple nights here and very happy with everything except funny motion sensing light switches I haven't figured out how to fully turn off, one comes on while turning in my sleep LOL, will ask staff for operation instructions. They have been superb helping me accomplish many tasks. Free faxing, computer and desk in room with free printing to 10 pages then 25 cents per page. Complimentary cooked to order eggs, with other expanded continental style options included. There's a small pool out back too. Decent eating options nearby, Starbucks next door too. Normal expanded cable tv with HBO. Good comfortable bed, nice lounge area, large fridge, micro, decent free coffee in room. $1 for front loading washing machine, 25 cents for 45 min dryer. Vending machines and

Stayed here for my cousin's wedding in June.  Got a great internet deal directly from the hotel.  We rented a one bedroom suite which had a ton of space and a small kitchenette. Furniture and fixtures were a bit dated but rooms were clean.  Free morning breakfast with omelettes and waffles.  Free WiFi access too.  Workout room and pool are on the smaller side.  Entire staff (from front desk to breakfast attendants) was super friendly and helpful.  Hotel worked out great for our trip.

i stayed in the hotel for a week and it was good. Clean, very welcoming reception and breakfast were all good. The location of the hotel is alittle bit far. The hotel also has free wifi internet in the rooms and self service laundary.

This hotel is fantastic for the price.  It's clean, the staff is friendly and helpful and they have an EXCELLENT complimentary breakfast with an omelet station and do-it-yourself waffles.  We really enjoyed our time there and wish we were able to stay longer.  Next time we will!  I wish there were more locations throughout the US.  One of the best hotels for the price I have ever stayed in!

Felt fortunate to find this hotel. A wonderful experience. The room had a small kitchenette, sleeper sofa bed and a very comfortable King size bed. With free internet on the flat screen TV, a small but clean pool and spa, there was only one thing that would top it...a great breakfast. Not only do you have the standard bagels, coffee, juice and waffle maker, you get a chef making custom order omelettes, as well as delicious hash browns and various meats, depending on the day. Although it is a short drive off the main freeway, it is well worth it. Safe clean neighborhood with a Starbucks in the same parking lot and several options for restaurants just across the street. The staff was always a joy to interact with.

We needed to find a hotel at 11:00 at night with two teenagers in the car who had been traveling for hours - we were exhausted and needed a place to stay since every beach hotel was booked in the area  - the staff was AMAZING and got us a clean fresh room.  The room came WITH a kitchenette and a little couch which we wish we had the time to use - the breakfast in the morning was also a pleasant surprise -= complimentary omelettes?! Plus yogurts, fresh belgiun waffles, juice and coffee?  starbucks next door made the morning!  and and and ... COMPLIMENTARY COMPUTERS!  Are you kidding me?  What a great hotel and what a bargain!  Would HIGHLY recommend for anyone!

I was so lucky to find this hotel. I cannot say enough good things about the hotel. Great location, clean rooms, wonderful staff, unbelievable low rates, and a wonderful breakfast with made to order omelets. I am already making plans to come back next year!!!!!

I can't understand the good reviews on this hotel.  I reserved the Executive Suite.  It was so tiny, the furniture was old and it was dumpy.  They showed us another simlar room.  I pulled out the sofa bed and it was tilted, plus, once you opened it there was no room to walk in the room.  There was no way I could stay there. I immediately called another similar hotel in the same area and it was 1000% BETTER.  I would NEVER recommend this place.
Manager Response: Dear Jep1996,  Thank you for taking the time to write one of your first reviews for us. We appreciate all feedback, as we always strive to improve our business.  We apologize that we were not able to meet your expectations this time--we really do strive to make sure each and every guest experience is a positive one/  We hope you might still give us the opportunity to earn your business, and show you all the great benefits that you may have missed, from our fantastic full cooked order breakfast, to our in-room computers and blu-ray players, and our attentive service.  We don't claim to run a perfect business, but if given another chance, you may find our hotel actually has much to offer, as many guests and reviewers have found.  Thank you again for your feedback.  Sincerely,  Jacin General Manager

Summary: This was a last minute find because everything in san Diego was sold out for memorial weekend the rooms were very clean spacious and the complimentary breakfast was very good for the price of a weekend night.  Would definitely stay here again.  Friendly atmosphere and good service as well.
Manager Response: Dear Cory V,  We are delighted with your positive feedback and thank you for your business. We are glad you chose to stay with us even though it was far from your original destination. Hopefully we'll get the opportunity to serve you again in the future. We are planning many improvements!  Again, we appreciate your feedback.  Sincerely,  Jacin General Manager

Summary: The hotel is beautiful clean rooms flat screen TV's also they have free breakfast that has a made to order omelet bar!!!! But above everything the Manager and staff treat you like family they are the best!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Ryan720,  Thank you for taking the time to write us your feedback. We are very pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us and and had the chance to experience our great amenities.   We do hope that you visit us again as we have some improvements in store for our guests.  Thank you for your business,  Jacin General Manager

Summary Heading: 5 stars from all these reviewers. Are they right?
Summary: I stayed on a priceline one nighter on Oct. 16, the glowing reviews pushed me over the edge. While the hotel is ok (about on par with its 2.5 star priceline rating) it didn't floor me in any way like these other reviewers. Are they real, I wonder? Finding this place, with it's low profile sign and location in the middle of two major tire stores is tough. (hint, just look for the Big O Tires and you're there) The two wake up calls I requested never rang, and I wasn't overly impressed with the room by any means. I will say, however, that the staff cooking the breakfast, especially the folks making the fantastic omelets, are really nice. I just wanted to throw a dose of reality on all of the 5 star reviews...
Manager Response: Dear Pete,  Thank you for your honest review of our hotel. We run our business with integrity and can attest that our reviews are real, whether positive or negative.
