We're sorry to hear about your experience with the wake-up calls--that's absolutely unacceptable, and certainly not the norm of how we run our business.  We are looking to renovate the hotel in the near future, and greatly appreciate feedback from guests such as yourself. Hopefully we could still earn you business in the future.  Sincerely,  Jacin  General Manager

Summary: We stayed here in September and October for a total of 8 nights.  I totally agree with the other "excellent" reviews for this hotel.  The entire staff (management, front desk, breakfast dining room, facilities and housekeeping) made our accommodations comfortable and enjoyable.  We arrived at SNA and the location was great for traveling on I-5 and I-405, and going to Laguna Beach/coast.  Delicious omletes with your choice of ingredients are a delightful way to begin each day of your stay here!
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you so much for your feedback! It's great to hear you enjoyed your stay and hope the continued improvements we make can make your future stays even better!

Summary Heading: It does not get any better than this
Summary: It does not get better than this!! I travel all over the country for work. Every other week I am in a different hotel. The Prominence Hotel has everything I look for in a hotel.  It had a refrigerator and a hot breakfast. The rooms were the nicest I have ever stayed in. At night it was quiet and the beds were very comfortable.  The In-Room Business Center is great; I have never seen anything like that before. In some hotels I have been in the lobby smells like cleaning products, not this lobby, they were defusing doterra essential oils that smelled amazing. Every staff member I saw was very friendly and helpful. The house keeping staff does a great job keeping the place clean and the front desk staff was very helpful in answering my questions. 	I brought my family with me on
Manager Response: Hello Joe,  We appreciate that you took the time to leave feedback on your stay. Since your last stay, we have implemented our full cooked to order breakfast! We hope that you will enjoy our delicious omelets if you're back in the area.  The DoTerra essential oils we're diffusing are part of our effort to offer a more natural and relaxing guest experience.   Thank you for your business!

Summary: After reading other recommendations for this establishment, we decided we would stay here.  Although it was only one night, we loved it.  The Hotel itself is very nice. The rooms were very clean, the beds were comfortable, and it had the most wonderful setup for the television and internet (all in one).  The folks at the front desk were friendly also.  The complimentary breakfast was a very nice assortment and quite tasty.  We were mesmerized in the lobby, it was filled with very large Amethysts everywhere, it was just beautiful.  We will definately stay here again in the future.
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for your review. We are always looking for ways to improve our business. If you're ever back in the area, we are excited to offer a full-cooked to order breakfast now! We have added a cooked to order omelet bar, Greek Yogurt, nutritious and delicious energy bars, and more. We look forward to the opportunity of serving you again in the future!

Summary Heading: Slick Place For A Slick Price
Summary: So I was on my way to San Diego and was looking for a hotel between Orange County and OceanSide, Looked high and low and came to find this hotel. First I have to say that the staff was very friendly and made sure my stay was more than pleasant. Stayed on the first floor in a corner room (117) and it was super quiet! The rooms are very well put together, moderan decor and the best damn bed I have slept in for a while. The room was a king suite which had a full size fridge and mini living space. I would highly recommend this place. Plenty of places to eat nearby. Aprox 2 miles over is a mall and lots of eateries, resturarant, whatever....
Manager Response: Dear Santa Barbara Native,  Thank you so much for the feedback. We appreciate your business and suggestions on how we can make improvements. We are excited to offer a full cooked to order breakfast now. If you're ever in the area again, hopefully we will get the chance to serve you!  Thank you for your business.

Summary Heading: professional staff, clean rooms, very quiet location
Summary: What a find!   Quiet location, not far from SNA, close to shopping.  Would return anytime. Melissa at the front desk easily answered all of our questions and made sure we were comfortable.  Large accessible bathroom in the 1 bedroom suite, although bedroom area was very tight for someone in a chair.

Our stay last month was for 4 days with my handicapped parents.  The rooms are  spacious and accessible and very clean!   As for the staff, and Manager (Jacin Tong) they went "over and above" to make my parents feel as comfortable as possible.  From the front desk to cleaning people. Breakfast was prepared everyday in there lounge which was  maybe 20 steps from there room. My parents live in Palm Desert and can't wait to come visit O.C area and stay at Prominence .   Thank you all!

Lake Forest is not known for it's hotels. Even so, this was a comfortable stay. The room I stayed in had a separate bedroom and separate AC. The flat screen in the living room had PC options and seemed more complicated than was worth it for me. The room was clean. Decor in community areas was different, not sure of the theme. There was a small pool and spa in the rear. It was raining and there was no cover. The spa jets are high on the wall, so the water was bubbly, but not conducive to focusing on your back. You pass through the small breakfast area to get to the pool. Water in the pipes from someone else's shower was noisy, but was made better by closing the closet door. All in all, I would stay there again.

I stayed here for business for 5 nights and I can honestly say the big comfy beds we a significant factor in helping me get over jetlag quickly. I wasn't impressed by the room at first (having been spolit by some 5 star luxury), but it grew on me. It was comfortable, and big with everything you could need - even a little kitchenette and lounge area.  All rooms have an internet TV, with personal business centre facilities right in your room. Fast, free wireless internet available as well. The staff were friendly and helpful.  The area was good for us (2 mins by car to work), there's also a Starbucks and Subway next door, a liquor mart and gas station across the road, and numerous other food options.

Wow! What a great little find this hotel was!  I recently stayed here with my infant daughter while having some work done to our home.  The staff are so incredibly friendly, accomodating, and helpful!  They really went the extra mile to make us feel welcome and help us get settled in.  The front desk attendant helped me with luggage and bags since my hands were full with my little one and even helped get me settled in the room.   Couldn't have asked for better service.  The rooms were clean, modern, and very cozy...I felt like it was a little home away from home!  We had a small "living room" with a love seat, chair, and table off to the side of the bed as well as a full kitchenette! The beds were SUPER comfortable and the hotel was quiet at night.  It has an awesome breakfast

My girlfriend and I needed to move from our place temporarily due to a house fire and we chose the Prominence Hotel. Not knowing how long we would be displaced, we saw that rooms looked spacious and upgraded. I have never been greeted with such hospitality and professionalism before. All my years traveling for work and play, I have stayed at well over 100 hotels and I would rank this hotel in the top 1! The price was great, service impeccable, and cleanliness stellar!  I have become a great fan of this place and will go out of my way to recommend  this hotel for anyone looking to stay in the South Orange County area!

Summary Heading: Prominence Hotel is the best hotel in the area! -- I would know.
Summary: Prominence Hotel is clean, comfortable, and affordable. I live in Southern Orange County and I have stayed in almost every hotel. I frequently book rooms with my girlfriend when we want some piece and quiet away from the house. We've tried every hotel within a 20 mile radius; and Prominence is by FAR the BEST. First, I would like to mention the bedding. Prominence uses an Eco-memory foam, comparable to tempur-pedic. I have never gotten a better night's sleep at any other hotel. Second, the costumer service is incomparable to any near-by location. The staff, from the general manager (Jacin) on down, will work tirelessly to meet their guest's satisfaction. Third, Prominence uses an awesome high-tech television system. Each television has a built in computer. Tuning into channel

I am so extremely happy with my experience at The Prominence Hotel! The staff is amazing on all levels. They smile and give off such a positive energy that welcomes you like no other place I've stayed! Some other hotels may offer some of the same ammenities as this hotel, but in my experience I have never stayed at another place that makes me feel safe, cozy AND appreciated! Breakfast is a great treat every morning..they are very environentally aware..100% organic coffee in the rooms, biodegradable products, I mean wow, they really do care about being green, they dont just want to be called a green hotel, they practice all they can to improve ways to help!Jacin is the General Manager and makes himself available as opposed to other hotels where management avoids people...Henrylyn

We have stayed here many times.  When it was a Comfort Suites and now that it has changed affiliations.  We worried about the change.  We are Comfort Suites travelers and hated to lose the ability to accumulate and use our points.  But we'll endure for a great nights stay.  We were here for 8 days.  Truthfully, I think the change may have a been a good thing.  They have always honored our requests for a top floor room.  We get the two room king suite and it's always immaculate.  Worth the slight upgrade price when you're here for a while.  The memory foam topper on the king bed makes it a very comfortable bed and a great sleep.  Great, free internet service is a plus for business and personal use.  The entire hotel inside and out is always spotless and smells great.  Close to

Summary Heading: Highly Recommend - Clean & Friendly with Great TV System
Summary: I landed in this hotel a few years ago and continue to return every time I'm in Orange County CA, (which is several times a year).  I'm on the road constantly, hotels and travel are my business but this hotel outshines most others.  The staff is very friendly and helpful, the rooms are always exceptionally clean and they have this great TV system where I can surf the net on the big screen TV from my bed.  Breakfast is predictable (a Choice Hotels mandate) but it has enough differences daily to keep me interested for my average two night stay.   I highly recommend it especially to other business travelers.

Summary Heading: Excellent value in a moderately priced hotel - highly recommended!
Summary: My husband & I stayed for one night in this hotel while visiting friends nearby.  We were particularly impressed with the service & quality.  Check in was quick, friendly and efficient; the rooms were very acceptable and included a small kitchen with a large fridge and sink.   The breakfast was adequate and included in the cost, as was the wireless internet access.  There was no additional cost for parking.   We left behind a hair brush and the hotel emailed me the following day to advise me of this,    All in all a good experience and highly recommended.  (We had stayed at a much more expensive Hilton Hotel for the 2 prior nights in San Diego, and this was vastly  better at a much lower cost).
Manager Response: Dear rbinsyndney,  I apologize about the duplicate, but I sent you a message through the incorrect link.    Thank you again for your feedback, it is very valuable for improving our business.  We hope to serve you if you're in the area again.  Our hotel should have an expanded TV channel listing, and an improved breakfast on your next visit.  Jacin Tong

Summary: This is a great, clean, friendly and centrally located lodging choice for Lake  Forest, California.  We stayed here twice in Jan 2010 for a total of 6 days.  The staff is attentive and the room was nicely appointed with a cozy sitting area, large bath and wi-fi. We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Timbercliffe,  Thank you for taking the time to comment on our hotel.  We're happy your stay was satisfactory, and hope to exceed your expectations the next time you stay in the area.  We are excited to announce an expanded TV channel listing in our rooms, and planned improvements to the breakfast.  Again, thank you for your comment, and thank you for your business.  Jacin Tong

Summary Heading: Quite a good hotel for the price
Summary: My wife and I have stayed at this hotel a number of times and each time we are impressed with the quality vs. the price. The room is clean, relatively large, has a small kitchenette, and a comfortable bed. The breakfast is satisfactory (i.e., more than just a continental breakfast). The staff is friendly. We will stay there again.

Summary Heading: A good hotel and I especially impressed by their warm service.
Summary: The Manager, Mr. Tong, and his staff gave me very warm service that I didn't expect, especially it was the first time I'd been in Lake Forest. Perhaps, his family originated in Hong Kong gained me some bias. But the spacious room and internet connected TV are really good. I defintely recommend this hotel to anyone I know. It'd be nice if they provide liquid soap instead of bar soap.

Summary Heading: Convenient location, great rooms, breakfast and staff, we recommend it to family!
Summary: My husband and I traveled here to visit relatives with our 17 mo. old daughter. We loved this hotel. It looks nice from the outside and is located right in the middle of everything. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful asking always if we needed anything else. The breakfast was great and fully stocked each morning. The rooms were nice and clean with a mini kitchen that worked great to have food for our daughter. There is a partition in the room so her pack-n-play was on the other side, giving us a litle separation. Small but nice workout room that is open 24/7 and a pool (which we didn't use.) We used the laundry room too.  I can't say enough good things about this place - my husband was like "okay, enough about how great the hotel is!" We recommended it to other family

Summary Heading: Good solid hotel - good front desk
Summary: I needed a clean, quiet hotel with wifi near a variety of locations near Laguna Nigel and I made a good choice in the Comfort Suites in Lake Forest.   Likes:  Front desk staff. Friendly, engaging, helpful, and just plain nice. An example of the good service by the front desk I looked up directions in my room and forgot to bring my notes with the directions on them. As I went flying by the front desk I asked a quick question on directions thinking I could wing it and they had pre-printed directions of the location I needed to go to. In fact, they had an entire book of pre-printed directions to the hotel to a bunch of different locations. Cleaning folks said hi everyday. Room was cleaned immaculately. As a woman traveling alone on business was looking for a safe comfortable place to stay for 4 nights in Orange County close by the airport.  Looked at places closer to the airport but from the reviews I weren't sure that they would be quiet or safe enough. Found the comfort suites at lake forest on the internet. Researched using trip advisor and other sources and decided to stay here.   The room is  just about as pictured on the website, the difference being that in the living room the TV is a flat screen instead of the older model tv that is shown.   Didn't have any parking problems although the front parking lot got filled, there was space behind the hotel. Other amenities include the business center and guest laundry. The staff was efficient and friendly as well.

Summary Heading: Not bad, but not great either.
Summary: Stayed for 1 night on January 10th.  Checked into a studio room with 1 king bed.  Typical Comfort-Inn or Holiday Inn Kind of decor with 80's style drapery and bed covers.  Everything was clean, so I am not complaining much.  Kitchenette area has a refridgerator, stove, microwave oven and coffee maker.  Refridgerator is a little noisy, so it may interfere with your sleep.  Same goes with the AC unit...it's a wall mount unit (not central AC), so if you turn it on, it stay on until you turn it off.  Free breakfast in the lobby was blah.  Paper plates and napkins, plastic utensils, generic pastries, waffles and pancakes from Costco...again I am not complaining much since it's complimentary.
